title: RegisterAction
description: The act of registering to be a user of a service, product or web page.

related.FollowAction: Unlike FollowAction, RegisterAction doesn't imply that the agent is expecting to poll for updates from the object.

related.JoinAction: Unlike JoinAction, RegisterAction implies you are registering to be a user of a service, not a group/team of people.

related.SubscribeAction: Unlike SubscribeAction, RegisterAction doesn't imply that the agent is expecting updates from the object.
